title: Ability Improvements
content:
ock Ability Improvements

You'll need to fulfill the following requirements to unlock Ability Improvements

All Classes at Level 4

Ability Improvements Tips & Notes

For instance, if you are a Warlock, your primary ability is going to be Charisma. Increasing your ability by plus one will give you plus one to your Eldritch Blast attack rolls, plus one to your Eldritch Blast damage rolls (if you have Agonizing Blast, which most Warlocks will take), plus one to your Charisma saving throws, as well
